short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Share Taps & Feedback, see notifications and have immediate access to your profile with our Chrome extension integrated with Gmail.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Now you don't have to leave what you are doing to use Tap My Back! With Tap My Back's Chrome extension and Gmail integration, you never lose context as you are able to receive notifications, give taps and feedback while doing your daily activities.

Know every time your team gives or requests feedback from you. Share your recognition Taps, Give and Request Feedback in the exact moment that you want to and check your development with just one click.

Pick an email that you sent or received to quickly share Taps, Give or Request feedback to a colleague or a manager! You will be redirected to Tap My Back where you can finish your action. 

By installing Tap My Back's Chrome extension & Gmail integration, you don't have to worry about going to the app to recognize your peers or request feedback to your team leader - Tap My Back is now right where you are!
